statements: SELECT * FROM attendee_preferences;
SELECT name, gender FROM attendee_preferences WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, interests FROM attendee_preferences WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM attendee_preferences ORDER BY age DESC, name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(attendee_id) AS total_attendees FROM attendee_preferences;
SELECT * FROM attendee_preferences WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, age FROM attendee_preferences WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT interests) AS num_interests FROM attendee_preferences
SELECT * FROM attendee_preferences WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT name, gender, interests FROM attendee_preferences WHERE name LIKE '%John%'
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id > 5;
SELECT event_name, event_type, event_date FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM attendees ORDER BY attendee_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Conference';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_type = 'Conference';
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees JOIN events ON attendees.attendee_id = events.event_id;
SELECT attendee_id, attendee_name, attendee_preferences FROM attendees WHERE attendee_preferences->>'language' = 'English';
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees;
SELECT attendee_id, name, email FROM EventAttendees ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT activity_name, description, location FROM EventActivities WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT attendee_id, activity_name, preference_score FROM EventPreferences INNER JOIN EventActivities ON EventPreferences.activity_id = EventActivities.activity_id;
SELECT name, age FROM EventAttendees WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT * FROM EventAttendees;
SELECT attendee_id, name, email FROM EventAttendees WHERE age >= 18 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT activity_name, description, date, time FROM EventActivities WHERE location = 'New York' AND date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT preference_score, preference, attendee_id FROM EventPreferences WHERE preference_score > 5 ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT attendee_id, name, email, preference FROM EventAttendees JOIN EventPreferences ON EventAttendees.attendee_id = EventPreferences.attendee_id;
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT attendee_id, name, email FROM attendees;
SELECT event_id, event_name, location FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT activity_id, event_id, activity_name FROM activities WHERE activity_type = 'workshop';
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE name = 'John Doe';
SELECT attendee_id, name FROM attendees WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT event_name, event_date, location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT activity_name, activity_type FROM activities WHERE event_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY activity_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM preferences INNER JOIN attendees ON attendees.attendee_id = preferences.attendee_id WHERE food_preference = 'Vegetarian' AND drink_preference = 'Water';
SELECT * FROM attendees
SELECT full_name, age, gender FROM attendees ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT event_name, date, location FROM events WHERE date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT attendee_id, full_name, email FROM attendees WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT event_name, location, capacity FROM events ORDER BY capacity DESC
SELECT * FROM attendees WHERE age > 25
SELECT full_name, email FROM attendees WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT event_name, date, location FROM events ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT full_name, age, preferences FROM attendees WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com%' AND gender = 'Female'
SELECT a.full_name, ea.status, e.event_name FROM attendees a JOIN event_attendees ea ON a.attendee_id = ea.attendee_id JOIN events e ON ea.event_id = e.event_id
